strings.s: Shit... I was almost there!
Damn...
Okay... That's the last one I lost...
Looks like we have a lucky girl here...
Well done... You are not cheating, are you?
Damn... I can't believe you're almost beating me...
Fuuuuck!!!
Damn... I could almost smell the scent of your panties...
Don't worry... I'll make you take off these shorts again in no time...
You look much better topless, girl... Let's see if I can make you take this shirt off again...
You will need more than that to beat me, though... I'll put more money in the table...
You will need more than that to beat me, though... I'll put more money in the table...
Uurgh... Let's keep betting and I'll take my money back, girl...
Sigh... Okay... You won...
Yes... I'm the king, baby...
Damn... I'm starting to think you're losing on purpose...
Are you sure you know the rules of the game?
Oh, oh... Bad luck for you...
I'm back on track... And you are in trouble now, girl...
Ha... I think my luck is turning!
Yes... I got this one!
Come on, girl... You already know what happens now...
I... I know...
Yeah... Good to see you're getting used to take off your clothes for me...
And... I win... Again...
Looks like you lost your boots to me, girl...
I... I don't care about the boots... But I need the seal... Please, can't I just borrow it and stop this stupid game?
I already said... Beat me in this game and that trinket is yours...
You can bet your shirt now... Just take it off and put it over the table and we can keep playing... If you win, you can have your boots back...
My shirt!? But I... I...
Come on... My men will come here later to drink and they will enjoy the show too if you don't hurry up...
Come on... I know you've been flashing your tits around the village... Don't get shy on me now...
Bastard... I... I'll do it... Only because I don't have any other choice...
Your shirt now belongs to me, girl...
Please... Stop this nonsense... I need my shirt... I... can't leave this place like this...
That would be a bad idea... My men would go crazy if they see you running topless in the open...
Your only option is to keep playing... I offer the shirt I won and you offer your shorts... So put it over the table...
Why... Why are you doing this to me?
Because you agreed to it... Now let's continue...
I just hope you don't get a cold...
Oh Lord... This can't be happening to me... This can't be happening...
You better believe it's happening... And now you...
NO!! Not my panties... Never...
Really? Are you planning to go out wearing only panties?
Please... Give back my clothes... _Please... please..._
You mean MY clothes... You gambled them by your own will... And there's only one way to have them back...
You know what is needed to keep playing... Your panties for the shorts...
You've been giving handjobs to the security officers around the village and now are embarassed to take off your panties? Come on!
You've been sucking cock of security officers around the village but now are embarassed to take off your panties? Stop acting like you're not a slut and let's keep playing...
I... hate you so much...
Yeah... I have a contact in the Yakuza that will pay good money for these used panties...
No... no... no... _This isn't happening... This isn't happening..._
Looks like you don't have any more 'tangible assets' to gamble, girl...
Please... I beg you... Don't do this to me... I can't get out like this... _please... please..._
Come on, girl... You know the drill and I already seen these perky tits of yours... Put the shirt over the table again if you want to keep trying to beat me...
Come on, girl... You know how it works and I already seen your nice panties... Now put your shorts over the table again if you don't want to run topless around the village...
Come on, girl... I already saw every inch of your skin... It's time to gamble your panties...
Come on, girl... I already saw every inch of your skin... It's time to gamble your panties...
A draw... Let's try this again...
Hey... Let's see if you can make him start drinking... This will make him an opponent easier to beat...
Uhh... Can we... have a drink first, sir?
Hell, yeah... It's good to see you want to get in the mood, girl... Let's empty a glass togheter!
Bottoms up, babe!
Blimey... This bloddy thing is much stronger than wine...
Try to make him drink again, This will make the game easier....
Would you buy us another drink before we continue playing, sir?
Damn... And I thought playing with you would be boring...
Another shot for us, girl!
Bloody hell... This is very strong... and tastes like pisssh...
If you still can handle the drink maybe we can...
More drinksh... We need more drinksh...
You are definetively my kind of girl...
Come on, girl... Let's drown our sorrows in the booze...
This ishh shoo... Buuut... I... I aaaaam _I can..._ _I am..._
Whoa... Easy there...
You should go slower with the booze, girl...
_Hey.. Can you hear me..._
Hey! What the fuck are you doing? Is this a...
You're fucking cheating... Do you think I'm stupid?
No... I'm sorry... I didn't mean to...
You fucking cunt...
KEEP PLAYING
ASK FOR A DRINK
Sigh...
You see... I'm not a bad person... I can't hear a girl begging like this without helping...
Oh please... please...
Yeah... I'll give you a chance to recover your clothes...
Thank you, sir... Thank you so much...
But, you see... I can't just lose my investments... So... How about you let me take some pictures of you just as you are now?
Pictures!? Without any clothes???
Yeah... I'm sure some exclusive pics will sell for much more than your dirty clothes...
Sell!?!? I... can't have nude pictures of me distributed around the world...
Don't worry... I won't be spreading them on all over the internet or something... Private collectors pay a lot for exclusivity... Don't you trust me?
I... I... I don't know...
Hey... If you're so afraid of exposing yourself to the public, then maybe we can do something more intense in private...
What... What do you mean...
I'll be direct... This nice body, and this juicy pussy of yours... It's driving me crazy...
So... Let me have some real fun with you and I'll give back not only your clothes, but your precious old trinket too...
You... What do you think I am?
I think you're someone that really need this clothes and this artifact... And you don't have many options now...
So... Just make a choice before I leave you naked here to the amusement of my entire platoon...
You're really out of luck today, aren't you? And I'm not interested in taking any more pictures of you...
This shouldn't be happeneing... I... I just wanted to have the seal for...
Yeah... Yeah... I already heard you say this several times, now...
And I also already said how you can get your hands on this little trinket...
Not to mention getting your clothes back again... I can't see if you're still worried about going out naked...
So... We have full privacy here... Let's have some fun together you will have everything you want...
ALLOW HIM TO TAKE PICTURES
ALLOW HIM TO GET CLOSER
CORRUPTION ({0}+)
It's the only way now
ATTACK HIM
I know your type, girl... You didn't think I was ready for this reaction, did you?
Can you... Can you at least let me use some of my clothes to take these pictures?
Sigh... You drive a hard bargain, dont you?
But I'm a reasonable guy... I'll give something to wear, okay?
Thank you...
Now take these and get into position for our shooting session...
Congratulations, girl... You took all my money...
You seem to really know how to play this game...
...or you have impressive cheating skills...
It was a fair game... And I won... Now... about what you promised to...
Don't worry... Believe it or not, I'm a man of my word...
Here... Take your damn thing... I can't afford to lose all that money...
Thanks...
I hope you're happy now... You can come have a drink with me any time you want...
I... I think I'll pass... Excuse me...
